title: FDA Grants Emergency Use of Convalescent Plasma, Love Letter to the Fed, Pandemic Can’t Stop the Rise of Cities
itunes:title: FDA Grants Emergency Use of Convalescent Plasma, Love Letter to the Fed, Pandemic Can’t Stop the Rise of Cities
description:
Dr. Dave Wessner, Professor of Biology at Davidson College, explains the pros and cons of convalescent plasma as a treatment for the coronavirus. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Michael Regan, Senior Editor of Bloomberg Markets Live Blog, discuss Mike's satirical love letter to Fed Chair Jay Powell from the stock market. Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director Andy Browne shares his thoughts on why New York, like other megacities around the world, may be about to shrink into a thousand smaller spaces but is not dead. And we Drive to the Close with Margie Patel, Senior Portfolio Manager at Wells Fargo Asset Management

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
